Two sweeps continue to fly over head, rising further and further into the
a=
ir. They are out numbered now by the Maximals and Autobots below them, and
=
it would seem that their perilous situation is becoming clear to them. At
t=
he last moment they appear to be about to turn tail and run, but the rapid
=
fire prowess from Kup, Nightshift and Talon quickly bring down the last of
=
the two sweeps, twin contrails of smoke mark their demise as they spiral
to=
wards the ground some distance away.

However in the distance back up force=
s continue to close the distance, the
large form of Deepstryke in his canno=
n mode, followed by Phobia and several
sweeps all in aerial modes can easil=
y be seen as they approach!

**********************************************=
***************

Meanwhile, high up on the wall of the dark tower, Rat Trap=
 and Windlord
continue their attempts to break in. Using Rat Trap=92s acid,=
 the wall sizzles
slightly as a little of the metal buckles under the assau=
lt from the acid.
However there is only a little of it, so the affects are =
small.

Windlord, adding his feather, sticking it in the crevasse created b=
y the
acid and creating a small explosion is able to create a small crack i=
n the
wall, one just large enough to fit a rat, and perhaps a small bird!

=
At the same time both of them can hear the sound of a ship approaching the
=
tower, a shuttlecraft, the IFF marking revealing it to be Predacon!

******=
*******************************************************


Hydras and Cyclon=
us continue their conversation as Hydras=92 shuttle closes
its distance.

>=
 Hydras Just arrived towards the BlackFortress
> and opening comlink to his=
 men he said "Here
> is Hydras, Try to sorrund the enemie... that
> will ma=
de them an easier target "

Cyclonus=92 voice comes over Hydras=92 speakers=
, =93Um sir, you have most of our
forces with you. I have deployed all of t=
he forces I have except for Scourge
and Myself. We will be face the enemy a=
s they attempt to close with the base
itself.=94

As Hydras=92 ship approac=
hes the tower, Iguanus comments, =93Sir, I am picking
up two Maximal energy=
 signatures high up on the wall towards the top.=94

Tarantulus nods, =93Ye=
s, and I think I see evidence of some sort of small
ordinance detonation. T=
hey are probably trying to breach the walls!=94

**************************=
***********************************

Back at the Ark Quickstride is quickly=
 grasp one thing, it is extremely
dark, pitch black! There is absolutely no=
 light! If it wasn=92t for his
internal maintenance systems he might even t=
hink his optic sensors had been
turned off.

Another interesting fact is th=
at he cannot hear anything either. He can hear
NO reply from Rodimus Prime,=
 but more than that, he cannot even hear the
sound of his own voice as he t=
ries to talk or the obvious movements he
himself was making.

Then the dark=
ness began to fade becoming more like a supra dense fog that is
beginning t=
o lift, dimly Rodimus=92 voice can be heard comming from somewhere,
=93Quic=
kstride!! Quickstride!!=94

OOC: If I have left something out or made a wro=
ng assumption about someone's
actions please let me know. A lot to keep tra=
ck of at once.

(TAG)

Preston

--000325575c16cc250e0498030a3d
